      • select

        public static ICompositionView select​(java.lang.String type,
                                      JMidiComposition composition,
                                      java.lang.Appendable ap)
                               throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Returns a view according to the user input.
        Parameters:
        type - the type of view you want.
        composition - the composition to be tracked by the view
        ap - an appendable for feedback
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when no view found
